description: Revision to previously consented works ref 2020/4969/L Revised roof form for annex and addition photovoltaic panels on roof of annex and existing house
reference_no_of_permission_being_relied_:
2020/4969/L

Various alterations including erection of replacement single storey garage and annex
following demolition of existing; excavation to create basement level swimming pool under
garden area; replacement windows and the re-instatement of the east side door and
porch. Internal alterations including changes to basement level layout; formation of
openings, kitchen reconfiguration and opening up of staircase at ground floor level;
subdivision of bathroom, door relocation and works to fireplaces at first floor level.
